23 /// Determine if the raw_ostream provided is connected to a terminal. If so,
24 /// generate a warning message to errs() advising against display of bitcode
25 /// and return true. Otherwise just return false.
26 /// @brief Check for output written to a console
27 bool CheckBitcodeOutputToConsole(
